game.name: Swipe Fruit Smash
game.shortDescription: Use the mouse to swipe through the fruits and collect all.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use the mouse to swipe through the fruits and collect all.

reviewHighlights.text: This indie mouse-driven puzzle game definitely starts out quite amateurish.. I mean, all written in Comic Sans.. it was called like this on Windows 95...
The best part of this game is when the guy says no when you try to match 2 tiles.
